title: 695 35th Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Still alive, but extensively decayed, ganoderma fruiting body at base, remaining structure is unsustainable; will be replaced

title: 880 El Camino Del Mar
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (787966); three trees are infected with Arbutus Canker which has caused large portions of the trunk to decay and crack, the fungal infection is starting to affect the canopies of the trees, unfortunately there is no treatment to stop the infection; property owner to replace with two magnolias for better spacing, also working with applicant on options for more replacements or adding more permeable sidewalk

title: 733 Arguello Boulevard
Reason(s) for removal: 90 percent canopy decline, has declined steadily for more than three years, decay in large branches and very poor structure; will be replaced

title: 500 Arguello Boulevard
Reason(s) for removal: Has large five foot vertical cavity, is declining, likely won't survive root pruning required for sidewalk repairs, roots girdled by grate; can be replaced but needs to be shifted South

title: 2655 Broderick Street
Reason(s) for removal: Decay evident and widespread, fruiting bodies (mushroom) and missing bark, white rot, declining canopy, has experienced multiple limb failures; will be replaced

title: 576 Union Street
Reason(s) for removal: Has suffered transplant shock and main trunk has died; will be replaced

title: 1615 Sutter Street
Reason(s) for removal: One-third to one-half of tree failed and caused tear-out in main stem, failure is at main union therefore compromising structural integrity where other limbs arise from main union, tree has lived bark back of failure, likely to fail if storm brings non-prevailing wind direction, tear-out is so large that tree cannot compartmentalize the wound; will be replaced

title: 2X Miraloma Drive
Reason(s) for removal: Declining and structurally problematic given proximity to the pedestrian bridge

title: 184 Amber Drive
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (785564); nearly dead, decay present and only green leaves have started browning; cannot be replaced due to narrow sidewalk and presence of underground utilities

title: 380 Cumberland Street
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (787960); extreme decline in health with no potentioal for recovery, as time goes on the likelihood of a catastrophic failure will increase; will be replaced

title: 1634 Alabama Street
Reason(s) for removal: Tree is unstable, significant decay at base, high likelihood the tree will fall over within one year if left standing; will be replaced

title: 399X Eugenia Avenue (301 Eugenia Avenue)
Reason(s) for removal: Large wound at main branch union, as decay progresse tree will fail; will be replaced
